check-door.description: Verify door is closed, alert if open. Uses YOLO vision to detect doors and displays alerts on robot face.
check-door.author: evil_sky-check-door

count-door.description: Count the number of doors in the room by scanning with camera and moving around. Rotates base 360° in 8 steps with YOLO detection.
count-door.author: evil_sky-count-door

count-people-in-room.description: Count people in room by rotating and scanning with camera. Uses YOLO person detection with 360° base rotation.
count-people-in-room.author: evil_sky-count-people
